Investors who bet on the IPO can check the share allotment status online on the registrar's website.

item.title: RIL shares fall 0.43% as investors weigh Meta AI partnership against delayed Jio IPO timeline

review.headline_rewrite: RIL shares fall 0.43% as investors weigh Meta AI partnership against delayed Jio IPO timeline
bullets: Brokerage firms maintained positive ratings on RIL following recent AGM announcements.
JPMorgan retained its Overweight rating with a target price of ₹1,695, while Kotak maintained Add with ₹1,555 target.
Jefferies and HSBC kept Buy ratings at ₹1,670 and ₹1,630 respectively.
According to Santosh Meena of Swastika Investmart, the stock decline reflects investor disappointment with the Jio IPO timeline being pushed to H1 2026, later
